thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 26 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-National General Holdings Q4 Loss Per Share $0.09

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-National General Holdings Q4 Loss Per Share $0.09
text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - National General Holdings Corp:
* NATIONAL GENERAL HOLDINGS CORP REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 OPERATING EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.28 * Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.09 * Q4 REVENUE $1.0 BILLION * QTRLY ‍GROSS WRITTEN PREMIUM GREW 30.1% TO $1,067.2 MILLION​
* QTRLY ‍NET WRITTEN PREMIUM INCREASED BY 7.8% TO $799.8 MILLION​
* QTRLY ‍NET EARNED PREMIUM GREW 3.0% TO $843.0 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
